body.p: The College of William & Mary is the second-oldest college in the United States, located in Williamsburg, Virginia.

section.title: Student Population
section.p: William & Mary has around 9,000 students, including both undergraduate and graduate students.

section.title: Popular Majors and Degrees
section.p: Popular majors include Business, International Relations, Government, and History. It also offers a highly respected Law program.

section.title: Location
section.p: The university is located in the historic town of Williamsburg, known for its colonial history and close proximity to national landmarks.

section.title: Mascot
section.p: The mascot is the "Tribe," reflecting the school's unique sports tradition.

section.title: Additional Information
section.p: William & Mary is known for its rigorous academics, historic campus, and emphasis on public service.
